issue.title: LaserScan causes gazebo to crash when moving around

content.raw:
I just tried running default branches of gazebo and drcsim in debug mode, but am unable to reproduce the crash.

It looks like a race condition in [tmpPlaneBuffer array](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/ba1993e18ce8fd84a97bc09c750398d61c0b92e4/deps/opende/src/heightfield.cpp?at=default#cl-924), where `tmpPlaneBuffer[i + 1]` is not accessible (with address of `0x110`).

Can you do a "thread apply all bt" and see if there are multiple threads trying to access `heightfield.cpp`?

Thanks,
John
